qrList.label: User
qrList.title: Test send

qrList.label: ‚ùåüí¨
qrList.title: Delete message

qrList.label: ‚úÇ.?!
qrList.title: Delete last sentence. Saves orig message.

qrList.label: ‚ùåü´Ñ
qrList.title: Remove <tags>, [bracketed messages], and asterisks. Saves orig message.
qrList.message:
/hide {{lastMessageId}} |
/re-replace find=/<style>[\S\s]+?<\/style>\|<(?!\!--\|\/?thinking\|\/?meter\|\/?progress\|\/?data\|\/?a\s\|\/?img)\/?[\S\s]*?>\|(?<=\n)[^\n\S]+(?!\n\n[^\s])/gi replace={{noop}} {{lastMessage}} | /setvar key=msg |

/re-replace find=/(?<=<a[^\n<]+?href=['"][^\n<]+?)['"][\S\s]*?>/gmi replace="zz zz" {{getvar::msg}} | /setvar key=msg |

/re-replace find=/(?<=<img[^\n<]+?src=['"][^\n<]+?)['"][\S\s]*?>\|<img[^\n<]+?src=['"]\|<a[^\n<]+?href=['"]/gmi replace="zz zz" {{getvar::msg}} | /setvar key=msg |

/re-replace find=/zz/gmi replace={{noop}} {{getvar::msg}} | /setvar key=msg |

/re-replace find=/(?<=[^\n]\n)\n+\|^\s+\|\s+$/gi replace={{noop}} {{getvar::msg}} |

/setvar key=msg <details>
<summary>TEXT FORM</summary>
{{pipe}}
</details> |

/len {{char}} |
/if left={{pipe}} rule=lte right=0 else={:
  /pass {{char}} |
  /sendas name={{pipe}} {{getvar::msg}}
:}
{:
  /comment {{getvar::msg}}
:}

qrList.label: ü¶ñ
qrList.title: Replace words/phrases. Saves orig message.
qrList.message:
/setvar key=msg {{lastMessage}} |

/setvar key=thesaurus {
"wanton\|carnal":"{{random:shameless,lewd,sensuous,lustful}}",
"girth\|manhood\|shaft\|length\|\bmember\b\|\brod\b\|hardness":"{{random:cock,penis,dick}}",
"languid":"{{random:lazy,slow}}",
"\blithe\b":"{{random:agile,slim}}",
"saunter\|sashay":"stroll",
"core\|heat\b\|slit\b\|bare sex\|folds\|nethers?\|depths\|womanhood\|wetness\|petals\|lower lips":"{{random:vagina,pussy,cunt,cunny}}",
"stud\b":"{{random:handsome,lover boy,cutie}}",
"coy\b":"{{random:shy,timid,bashful}}",
"(ridge\|strain).{1,10}arousal":"{{random:erection,bulge}}",
"digit\b":"finger",
"rivulet":"small stream",
"seed\b":"{{random:jizz,cum}}",
"conspiratorial":"{{random:secretive,scheming}}",
"pet\b":"bitch",
"\borb\b":"eye",
"(heart, \|mind, )?body,? and soul":"{{random:wholly,entirely,fully}}",
"pearl\b":"{{random:clit,clitoris}}",
"\bbud\b":"nipple",
"ministration\b":"{{random:stimulating,arousing,erotic}} touch",
"ministrations":"{{random:stimulating,arousing,erotic}} touches",
"testament":"{{random:evidence,proof}}",
"(something )?uniquely [a-z]+":"something {{random:smelly,stinky}}",
"palpable":"{{random:perceptible,noticeable,evident}}",
"a ([a-z]+ )?mix(ture)? of":"{{random:both,a combination}} of",
"half-lidded":"{{random:half-closed,relaxed,aroused,erotic}}",
"pool.{1,15}belly":"{{random:heightened,intensified,built up,escalated}}",
"(that )?fill.{1,15} [a-z\\s]{1,20}":"{{random:echoed,dispersed,diffused}}",
"maybe, just maybe":"maybe",
"calloused \|bruising (?=kiss)\|kiss-(bruised\|swollen) \|predatory \| wickedly\| slyly\|chestnut \|emerald \|fiery \|dusky \| darkly\|forbidden (?=plea\|des)":""
}

|

/foreach {{pipe}} {:
	/re-replace find=/{{var::index}}/gi replace={{var::item}} {{getvar::msg}} | /setvar key=msg
:} |

/hide {{lastMessageId}} |

/len {{char}} | /setvar key=len |

/run varname=len creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=false rule=eq {: /setvar key=len 0 :} |

/if left=len rule=lte right=0 else={:
  /run utils.makeoutput
:}
{:
  /comment {{getvar::msg}}
:}

qrList.label: üñºÔ∏è
qrList.title: Display char avatar/external img in the chat
qrList.message:
/buttons labels=["Avatar","External"] | /setvar key=todisp | /run varname=todisp creamsan.isvardefined | /if left={{pipe}} rule=eq right=false {: /break :} | /if left=todisp rule=eq right=Avatar else={: /input

Input image link

| /setvar key=imglink | /run varname=imglink creamsan.isvardefined | /if left={{pipe}} rule=eq right=false {: /break :} | /comment :} {: /comment :}
